item.title: Privacy
item.description: Privacy Policy Last updated: August 11, 2016 This Privacy Policy relates to information collected by any websites, applications and/or other online services that Build Hello may make available from time to time (collectively, “Build Hello” or “we” or “us” or “our” or the “Site”) and is part of the Build Hello Terms of Use and Conditions located here.

item.title: Terms
item.description: Terms and Conditions of Use: Last updated: July 08th, 2023 Build Hello (“Build Hello” or “we”, www.buildhello.ca, “our” or “us”) is both a Trade Name and Trade Mark, owned by Yuri Tricys. Build Hello operates the Build Hello website located at https://buildhello.ca, and engages in web technology consulting, web development, and web design services, collectively ‘The Services.
